events.message: We have successfully received your application for the Software Engineer position and look forward to reviewing your qualifications in detail.
Your application has been categorised under the Engineering department based on your experience and skills related to software development.
A dedicated recruiter has been assigned to your case to guide you through the upcoming interview stages and address your questions promptly.
Our initial screening interview took place smoothly, and the recruiter was impressed by your technical knowledge and experience during the conversation.
You promptly responded to the interview feedback email and expressed enthusiasm to proceed further with the technical interview stage.
We have scheduled your technical interview for June 10th at 2 PM UTC with our senior software engineering team. Please prepare accordingly.
